His cheating was sensationally outed last week after it emerged he'd tried to bed a girl following a night out at a Drake concert. 
And it seems that Lewis Bloor has well-and-truly blown his chances with Marnie Simpson , as she revealed she will "never speak to him again". 
After two separate women came forward with stories of the TOWIE star's love-rat ways, the 25-year-old star blasted her ex saying he didn't know how to be "truthful". Read More Marnie Simpson "might have exaggerated" about Lewis Bloor to Aaron Chalmers - and says she'll STOP any fight between men "I'll never speak to him again" (Photo: WENN.com) 
Writing in her Star magazine column, the MTV stalwart explained that she had been left heartbroken after finding out her boyfriend of one year had cheated. 
"I'm in shock and I'm numb," Marnie revealed. "It's the worst betrayal and I can't even describe how I feel." 
And, making her feelings about Lewis very clear she slammed him for his lying and cheating ways, writing: Read More Are Marnie Simpson and Lewis Bloor back together? Love rat 'hints at reunion' with cryptic tweet Marnie, aren't you a bit cold in that dress? (Photo: WENN) 
"He doesn't know how to be truthful and will continue to lie until the day he dies. I'll never speak to him again." 
She added that Lewis - whom she fell for during their stint on Celebrity Big Brother 2015 - and his actions had left her utterly broke. 
"I'm broken into a million pieces," she explained, adding: "I feel like I've loved someone who doesn't exist." "I'm in shock and I'm numb," Marnie revealed. "It's the worst betrayal and I can't even describe how I feel" (Photo: marniesimpson/Instagram) 
Marnie's heart-breaking missive comes just a week after Ammelia Gueste, 24, revealed the reality star cheated on Marnie with her after a Drake gig at the O2 Arena. 
A shocking recording made on the night shows a half-naked Lewis in bed and sharing a snog under the covers with the brunette beauty while a friend films the intimate moment. 
Speaking to The Sun at the time, Ammelia said: “My friend spotted him as we were queueing up for a ride back to our hotel after the gig. We asked what he was doing and he said his mates had gone back to Essex without him. The Geordie Shore star vowed she would never speak to Lewis again (Photo: Snapchat/MarnieGshore) Her heart-breaking missive comes a week after it was revealed Lewis had cheated on her (Photo: WENN) 
“As a joke I asked if he wanted to come in to Central London with us and he jumped in the back.:" 
After getting back to his hotel room with a pal, Amelia said that Lewis became incredibly flirty and things were quick to escalate to the next level. 
“I was so shocked when I found out that he had a girlfriend, but by that point we had already kissed several times. 
She added: “We were kissing, but he didn’t touch me inappropriately – I kept pushing him off when his hands ventured too far.” 
Just hours after the story broke, Marnie took to social media to confirm the news and slam her ex-boyfriend's womanising ways. 
She wrote in a scathing Twitter rant: "Didn't really want the whole country to know but looks like that didn't last long . Happy Valentine's Day to me. U f**king scumbag!" Like us on Facebook
